website_summaries.verdict: A great option for the man who wants a classic bomber look in a nylon style.
pros: Owners felt this jacket was a good value for the cost and is warm, well-made, and wears well over time
It also rates highly for its numerous pockets, comfortable fit, and durability

customer_reviews.title: It fit him incredibly well and he loved it. He just beamed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 95 year old father in-law and put a 5th Army Air Force patch on it for his birthday gift. It fit him incredibly well and he loved it. He just beamed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelleyz

customer_reviews.title: Quality and fit is exceptional.
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at the quality and finish on this jacket. I wore this through the winter. It was warm enough for the average 40 deg. NY weather. I am writing the review now, because I just used it for a motorcycle ride on an unusually cool (60 deg.) July morning. My leather would be too warm, and this jacket was perfect. What makes is work is the fit, and the wrist and waist bands. It was the perfect weight, but also the perfect wind breaker. This is an extremely versatile jacket that looks great and wears well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Macaluso

customer_reviews.title: Basic jacket, a little on the small side it costs more than it should
customer_reviews.text: Good for spring and fall weather, pretty light, I bought a Large and it's more like a Medium, so if you like your jackets on the loose side to wear a sweatshirt or flannel underneath you might opt for ordering this jacket one size up. Edit: I've decided to return this jacket for 2 reasons, it's just a little to small for a large, and I'm seeing similar jackets at Amazon that are much less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - Better Than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: Slightly more insulation than I thought from the description, but that makes it perfect for me - I didn't want the "puffier" version of the original MA-1 that I wore in the Air Force. The fit is pretty slim, but again, that's what I wanted. I am 5'11, 180 lbs, 34" waist, 33" sleeve, 16.5" neck. I bought a size "L" and it's perfect for me. If you are heavier, you might feel this is too snug. Construction is great and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Spurrs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, good quality and price. However this is a gift, if I receive feedback, I will post at a later time. I was surprised by the color of the lining, a bright orange but I am told this is common...........:)
customer_reviews.author: History enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: One of the best bombers around.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket fits great, fitted but not too snug or too loose. Price is great too. Higher quality than most of the designer bomber jackets that are 5x to 10x more.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Jacket -- UPDATE Quality problem
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE** After Wearing for 6 weeks the collar and sleeve cuffs starting 'pilling up badly. It's apparently poor material. Great looking Jacket! Looks very military. Great looking color too (Olive).
customer_reviews.author: ts twain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome style for me, fits ok
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is very nice. Comfortable to wear. Perfect for chilly weather. Also fashionable for jeans or khakis. The fit isn't perfect but not enough to complain. I enjoy this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: I'm J. :)

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT JACKET
customer_reviews.text: COMFORTABLE, PLENTY OF POCKETS THAT ARE SECURE, GOOD LOOKING, QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: Al & Josie

customer_reviews.title: Quality Classic Black Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this jacket for the price. It's not ultra thin for summer, but then it seems designed for spring and autumn use. I actually appreciate the slightly thicker material as it better fits a slender, athletic frame.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edward

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I'm liking this this jacket a lot. I'm about 5'9", 265... definitely a stocky guy. A bit snug, but very comfortable. And lots of pockets. Heavy duty zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Tman

customer_reviews.title: A great jacket for temperatures above freezing
customer_reviews.text: A great jacket for temperatures above freezing. Fits well, looks great (it was quite wrinkled out of the box though), and wears exactly as I like my jackets. I'm ordering another one in blue.
customer_reviews.author: siop5c

customer_reviews.title: Very well made MA-1 Jacket.
customer_reviews.text: This MA-1 is very well made. I recommend this Jacket to those looking for a MA-1. Good Stiching, a Good pockets design. I’m 5’11” medium frame and a XL fits just right.
customer_reviews.author: Travis R Klein

customer_reviews.title: classic can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: these are great jacket and I really like the style. They are comfortable and sturdy, which I like. I get compliments from people about this jacket. great find
customer_reviews.author: Youngster

customer_reviews.title: Nice stylish and a good price poor in selection when come to clor,,,,
customer_reviews.text: I like my jacket and I like to have more selection in color....is good for active people...
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the jacket yesterday and couldn't be more pleased. It's very well made and the fit is right on. I'm 5'9" 155 and bought a medium and it fits perfectly. Also,the price and fast shipping sealed the deal.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is much better than my other flight jacket. (I wore one for 28 years in USMC).
customer_reviews.author: Walter J. Hofman

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the ample inside pockets as well as the double outside pockets. The jacket is very comfortable, but it is just getting cooler here in New York so I can't tell how warm it's going to keep me yet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Borgner

customer_reviews.title: Cool vintage feel...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this jacket but was sent a different jacket. Had to exchange. Was worth the wait. Awesome jacket! Ordered a small fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Pioneer30

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: quality is good, a little be pricey, but I like it
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit...not shiny or swishy. I used this jacket for the entire northwest winter. Top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good coat
customer_reviews.text: XL size. I wear a 46 sport coat. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted...Motorcycle jacket...Pockets galore...
customer_reviews.text: I m 5'11" 260 husky build. Got the XXL looks and fits great. Usually tight fitting in chest. This one is just about right. Pockets more than adequate, inside and out, lots of pockets!! Lighter than expected, needed early spring to fall jacket, this one works. Metal zipper is nice, no cheap plastic one. Gonna use for motorcycle riding, snaps on pockets will securely hold my stuff...Did l mention it's got pockets...lol
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Many Pockets!
customer_reviews.text: Loved that this jacket has seven pockets total. Warm and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: Fit was perfect, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This coat was a hit with my 18 year old grandson. Fit was perfect, excellent quality. He has worn it every day since Christmas and says it is warm. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: VScan

customer_reviews.title: Very durable nylon shell fits us sizes
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality flight jacket nylon shell is much more durable than the polyester used by most other brands a lot of pockets
customer_reviews.author: joe denver

customer_reviews.title: and the quality is very good when considering the price
customer_reviews.text: The jacket fits just right, and the quality is very good when considering the price. It is a little heavier weight than I imagined - would be too warm if you are looking for something very light but should work for most moderate temps
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Schlottman

customer_reviews.title: Nice twist to the classic MA-1 jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice twist to the classic MA-1 jacket. Nice slim fit and does not bulge up like the original ones. Can easily be worn with jeans or slacks and it looks good either way.
customer_reviews.author: DEF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good and the sizing is right.
customer_reviews.author: yvoel

customer_reviews.title: Jamagel Love
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6',slim with long arms.the large is a great fit for me...sleeve length is excellent,the body is just a tad big but it fits the style of the jacket...no complaint....its all Jamagel
customer_reviews.author: Jamagel

customer_reviews.title: Great option!!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a jacket that I could wear in windy ass chicago while still looking fly, this jacket kept me warm and stylish all at once, good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Eissen

customer_reviews.title: Good - But Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly, but apparently runs 1 size too small. So I bought the next size larger. This fits in all dimensions except sleeve width. Which works, but seems a little bit tighter around the biceps than it should. And no, I haven't been working out at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Tah-Dah

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with the jacket. It is really stylish and fits nicely on me. I'm 6'2 and 200 pounds and L is just the perfect fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets and a great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jacket. And for around $30 it is great.
customer_reviews.author: George F

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I look like a pilot
customer_reviews.text: Very good fit and cool look. Pockets on the inside are a bit weird as they are sideways and stuff may slip out. Overall, still great.
customer_reviews.author: Leke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6ft2 in 200 pounds. Fits perfectly with room to wear a sweatshirt underneath!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: The worst thing is when I saw it was made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Really like the fit
customer_reviews.text: Really like the fit. It keeps you warm. I like the 2 pockets on the inside of the jacket. It's a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice. High quality look and feel
customer_reviews.text: If you are at the top of the size chart or the next size and you will be satisfied. I am 6' and 230 lbs the XXL fit perfectly. The jacket is high quality bomber style with lots of pockets. I ordered the olive color because it was on sale for <$30. It is very dark olive (almost black indoors). Very elegant looking and feeling nylon jacket. Just the right weight not overstuff like some in this style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: dark olive is a good color bought one in lg...... inside pockets are snap not zip. good sturdy main zipper. very good buy... bought a black one also... this one in med..... fits a little more snug but good...
customer_reviews.author: Willard G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much, warm and fashionable, but it's at a discount $9.00 after bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jacket, only thing to keep in mind the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jacket, only thing to keep in mind the inner fabric is bright orange, but the jacket feels great, lots of pockets without looking bad.
customer_reviews.author: ADV86

customer_reviews.title: Good flight jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Good pockets and construction. Looks good. Get next size up to ensure roomy fit.
customer_reviews.author: R. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable. 2 snap pockets on the outside and inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made jacket. Keeps me warm down to 30 degrees. Soft and comfortable. 2 snap pockets on the outside and inside plus a hand pouch behind the outside pockets to keep your hands warm without needing to unsnap the other side pockets. The green color is very dark and classy looking. Love this jacket. Great deal at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

product_meta.title: Levi's Men's Ma-1 Flight Jacket
product_meta.description: Unfilled ma-1 flight bomber jacket with front zipper closure
feature_bullets: Lower snap flap and double entry pockets
Rib knit collar, cuffs, and waistband
Levi's signature red tab on side seam
